data.eml:eml: A taxonomic synopsis of South American Cyanogomphini Carle with description of Cyanogomphus angelomachadoi sp. nov. from the Cerrado of Brazil (Odonata: Gomphidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Pinto, Ângelo Parise, Almeida, Marcus Vinícius Oliveira De (2016): A taxonomic synopsis of South American Cyanogomphini Carle with description of Cyanogomphus angelomachadoi sp. nov. from the Cerrado of Brazil (Odonata: Gomphidae). Zootaxa 4078 (1), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4078.1.6
